## Source: amazon-inspector (f1aa38d2e5718b378c2958a34a971314652bafc4462818307ae8e36df83f6cc7)
The package react-hook-form-5 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (16859ad1dd7dccbd28650fc9bcfb6adf8c12eb7ea09b4cf1bb3381532d3dcad1)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'react-hook-form-5' @ 90.9.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
